Calculates best case and worst case for sector profile at product level

Source: R/best_case_worst_case_sector_profile.R
best_case_worst_case_sector_profile.Rd

Calculates best case and worst case for sector profile at product level

Usage

best_case_worst_case_sector_profile(data)

Arguments

data

Dataframe. Sector profile nested output

Value

A dataframe

Examples

out <- toy_profile_sector_impl_output()

out |> best_case_worst_case_sector_profile()
#> # A tibble: 72 × 3
#>    companies_id                       product           company
